nodes.text: Enchanting Lure was the name of a painting available in the galaxy sometime after the Battle of Yavin during the time of the Galactic Civil War. It was made available during the Ewok Festival of Love. It depicted a female Rodian dancing inside a house. In the background, another painting titled Ewok Festival of Love could be seen hanging on the wall.
Enchanting Lure was a painting in the 2003 massively multiplayer online role-playing game Star Wars Galaxies: An Empire Divided, prior to the game's closure on December 15, 2011.
